title: SMSC update error. I cannot send messages from my pixel 2 phone from any messaging application.
content:
1.) I have cleared the data and cache of the messaging application.
2.) Restarted my phone.
3.) Removed and re-inserted my SIM card.
4.) Update and refresh the SMSC number. Update gives update error. Refresh gives "+7",154
5.) Sent feedback through phone.
6.) Contacted my mobile operator who gave me the above instructions, With no help.
